text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump and his cronies are champions of killing Americans on American soil, their response to COVID 19 is despicable and why over 135,000 Americans are dead and continuing to die! You have failed us and you never learn! https://t.co/KODHfmPOmZ
